meta.content: Ridgeline Academy is an A+ rated charter school in North Phoenix. Put your child on the path to success with Ridgeline Academy. Regal the Eagle is our mascot! #knowandgrow
Ridgeline Academy is an A+ rated charter school in North Phoenix. Put your child on the path to success with Ridgeline Academy. Regal the Eagle is our mascot! #knowandgrow

div.h3: Mission: To know and grow each child every day

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: Our Values - Ridgeline Academy provides families with a community school culture and small class sizes with an enriched Core Knowledge curriculum and high academic expectations in a respect-based learning environment supported by character- based education. Our values are grounded in the belief that students are literate in all subjects; are independent and critical thinkers; and are life-long learners and achievers.Learn More

div.p: Ridgeline Academy provides families with a community school culture and small class sizes with an enriched Core Knowledge curriculum and high academic expectations in a respect-based learning environment supported by character- based education. Our values are grounded in the belief that students are literate in all subjects; are independent and critical thinkers; and are life-long learners and achievers.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-stack combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: Student bulletin - Click here for information on student leadership, student events, programs, and more! [COMING SOON]

div.p: Click here for information on student leadership, student events, programs, and more! [COMING SOON]

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-stack combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left image-linked

img.alt: eagle athletics - Find more information about game schedules and athletics options.

div.p: Find more information about game schedules and athletics options.
Ridgeline Academy has earned the honor of being a “Core Knowledge School of Distinction.” We are one of only ten schools in the United States to receive this award.

div.h3: A Rated for six years running

p.em: Ridgeline Academy has garnered an A rating from the state of Arizona for six years in a row. Scores on state testing have also increased every year overall.
We have been in the North Phoenix/Anthem/Foothills community for over seven years, partnering with local organizations to create a community-centered school.
In the years that we have been open, we have served over 5,000 children in grades K - 8.
Average Teacher Salary (A.R.S 15-189.05) as added by Laws 2018, Ch. 285, 3:

div.p: 1. Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2019: $$45,020.83
2. Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2018: $40,977
3. Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018: $4,043.83

div.h3: We scaffold our learning for each individual student, with a full inclusion model. Students are tested using NWEA, a standards-based assessment program. Each quarter, they are reassessed for progress, and lessons are based on each student’s need.

div.p: Click here for more information about the Core Knowledge Language Arts, Social Studies, Mathematics, and Science programs.

Vendors and specialists from the community run our extra-curricular activities. From Zumba to Chess, Dance to Lego Robotics, Ridgeline Academy offers a range of opportunities to our students. If we don’t have what your student is looking for, we welcome new connections and ideas!
We offer Music, Art, Spanish, and PE for all students. These classes are taught by experts in their respective fields, enabling our students to have face-to-face time with master craftsmen and women.

div.h2: Ridgeline Academy does a wonderful job at meeting each student where they are at. The individualized approach to learning is second to none. We love this school, it is truly a family community.
div.p: Jen Revel, Parent / Link to Review
div.h2: All of the teachers my kids have been around as either a student of theirs or a student in the hall are very supportive, encouraging, and welcoming. The staff and administration has been supportive of our family as a whole. I wouldn’t have my kids attend any other school!
div.p: Nikki Nicole, Parent | Link to Review
